headline: Why Is Marriott (MAR) Up 2.3% Since Last Earnings Report?
summary: Marriott (MAR) reported earnings 30 days ago. What's next for the stock? We take a look at earnings estimates for some clues.

raw.headline: Why Is Marriott (MAR) Up 2.3% Since Last Earnings Report?

headline: Marriott India strengthens the Green Commitment on World Environment Day 2025
summary: Marriott India proudly achieved its ambitious goal for World Environment Day 2025, a commitment to plant 100,000 trees across its extensive portfolio of over 150 hotels nationwide. This significant undertaking marked a powerful escalation of Marriott India's dedication to sustainability and ecological restoration, building upon the success of its previous environmental initiatives.

headline: Westin Hotels & Resorts opens new property on Nirup Island, Indonesia
summary: The new resort is 40-minutes form Harbour Bay Batam and 20-minutes ferry ride from Singapore.

headline: Starwood Hotels development chief talks brand revival, growth opportunities
summary: CDO Abhay Bakaya said at the 2025 Boutique Hotel Investment Conference that the company plans to have around 50 hotels open by 2030.
